TopicTitle: cBBp SPC Pack v0.4: Fixed Failcan RCS and added some adapter pieces. Enjoy.

Articles.Content: make it anyways.
lol why?

I don\'t see anything about a shuttle in their thread-and they seem to be working on quite a lot of things anyway.

I say it\'s probably best to do it anyway.

are you using my struts or the stock ones?

They work perfectly fine as boosters........

Yours, the ones with 60k strength/shear. I used four connecting from the 9-to-1 adapter to the LFT. Uploading a video showing the struts.

BTW, I\'m not trying to be an ass, I\'m just trying to see if you know of a way to fix the problem. Your parts are very nice and well-made, it\'s just that I wished they would stop exploding or shifting.

Yours, the ones with 60k strength/shear. I used four connecting from the 9-to-1 adapter to the LFT. Uploading a video showing the struts.

BTW, I\'m not trying to be an ass, I\'m just trying to see if you know of a way to fix the problem. Your parts are very nice and well-made, it\'s just that I wished they would stop exploding or shifting.

coming in and saying 'Don\'t use it for [such and such]' is hardly a way to get any help.

As for your problem. care to take a video of its construction? I don;t have any of those other parts you use so craft is useless

http://youtu.be/L9g744bXvY0

Stock parts (command pod + decoupler) plus failcan9 LFEs and LFT.

if you load the included .craft does it do this. Strut connection locations and numbers are quite key to getting it to work 4 is simply not enough. The behavior displayed in the video is the exact behavior you get with to little number of strut connectors.

there is a reason i included .crafts.....

though i have noticed in peoples videos that the game runs differently on other peoples computers. This might be a problem with it.

Redid the kirffun Engines a bit to make them look like a different engine than Kerlines a bit. just a bigger regenerative cooling system is all.

also, if I continued to make that thing what would it\'s purpose be lol.

Might be doing a release soon. Depends how focused i am. In the future i am sensing a re texturing of the orignal parts.

The Durgun Capsules simple white, slightly textured with black panel lines and dots looks much better than anything the original parts have.
Oh wow those are big.

Oh wow those are big.

that\'s what she said =P
that\'s what she said =P

not really. those are just the original 1 meter engines. But I must say the small changes i made do make them look a tad bigger. which is ironic because i changed nothing really.

anyway uploading v0.4

and with this i think i am done for a while. I will make the unified docking ring for me and KW and then move onto other things lol

I have maybe an idea for the mod. Maybe you can make the falcon X?

That would be cool 8)
lol why? I get hardly any of the feedback i ask for and it is just a bigger version of the thing. i had the 3 meter version of this and no one liked it so i see no point lol.
I got a few more screenshots of the new version doing a launch and orbit around Kerbin to display the stages which I might be able to upload tomorrow if my account bandwidth is reset.

Hey CBBP, I must say that I\'ve skipped your mod until now (not a fan of huge rockets) but the Durgun... boy - it\'s fantastic! I absolutely love the RCS tanks, the way it gets put together... the details on the parachute pods... brilliant work.

thanks. I know what you mean about huge rockets. They are sort of eh. But they will come in handy one day.

I hope you didn\'t forget your strut connectiors to hold the heat shield onto the rcs tanks. that part is rather critical.
Now that I can upload images, I\'ve put the screens I took on the KSP screenshot thread.
and where might that be located?
Right here.
nice review. sorry your landing broke. I don;t use parachutes at all to land. keeping your asas during decent helps with this. Watch the video
A look at the Kerbal Docking System inspired by the iLIDS system not much to look at yet.

nice review. sorry your landing broke. I don;t use parachutes at all to land. keeping your asas during decent helps with this. Watch the video

Like I mentioned on that post I actually used thrust to cut the lines off so I could finish the landing under power, and it broke apart despite having my velocity at a mere 0.1m/s.
yeah. It probably works fine if you never deploy the chutes. The chutes give the whole system quite a shock. you can see them jerk when you deploy them lol.
